ygData.subject: Starting out
ygData.msgSnippet: First off I want to say how great it is that there ARE other gnomes out there who take such an avid interest in one of the few things that set us apart in
ygData.messageBody:
First off I want to say how great it is that there ARE other gnomes out
there who take such an avid interest in one of the few things that set us
apart in Gnorrath. Having followed your adventures and attempts at
discovering the lost knowledge of tinkering has kept me going...and now I am
ready to start working as well.
A few questions though....
I already know what to make as I progress, but I'm curious...how do you sell
the items you make (ie fireworks, cams, etc?) I really doubt anyone would
buy a flameless lantern, and I don't blame them, but what about other items?
I have successfully made some cams and can't seem to sell them. Nor
fireworks, which I have heard are a hit...which makes me feel useless since
I can't get rid of them.
Any advice would be appreciated, and since I don't know of any other gnomes
tinkering on my world this was the only place I knew to ask. Of course, if
there is another one out there that'd be great...

Phizn Frugin
MithMarr
